title: 3 and Out - Mike White vs. Zach Wilson, Aaron Rodgers Controversy, OBJ/Browns Dysfunction, Ruggs Tragedy , Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Mike White vs. Zach Wilson, Aaron Rodgers Controversy, OBJ/Browns Dysfunction, Ruggs Tragedy , Mailbag
description:
John touches on the Colts TNF throttling of the Jets, why backup Mike White's instant success makes Zach Wilson look even worse, and why the Colts' Week 8 loss to the Titans will continue to linger despite a bounce back W. He also gives his take on the potential long term consequences Aaron Rodgers catching heat for having to sit with COVID, why Twitter is delusional about Odell Beckham's value, and takes a sobering look at the Henry Ruggs DUI tragedy, He also explains his beef with the early college football playoff rankings, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag!

Subscribe NOW! Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
